text:
Pran Nevile (October 22, 1922 – October 11, 2018) was an Indian author. His works focused on Indian Art, Indian Culture and Indian History. He was best known for the 1992 book, "Lahore - A Sentimental Journey". He was an authority on pre-1947 Lahore and Nautch. Nevile was born in Lahore.
Nevile died on October 11, 2018 in New Delhi at the age of 95.
